description:
Enjoy the refreshing coolness of peppermint oil while you nourish your lips. This balm combines organic ingredients like extra virgin olive oil, extra virgin coconut oil and beeswax.Cruelty free.Matte finish.Ingredients: beeswax*, extra virgin coconut oil*, extra virgin olive oil*, peppermint essential oil*. *Organic.

        Sustainability








Organic








                      Organically grown content
name: Salt and Stone California Mint Lip Balm 0.15oz
